Posts.Content: You expect anyone with half a mind to believe that crap.
Posts.Title: Back after 30 years

Posts.Content: My wife's breast cancer came back in her bones after almost 30 years. Anyone else happen to? She is on Ibrance and Letrozole with monthly shot for bone strength. Would like,to,hear from anyone else in this unusual situation.
Posts.Title: Back after 30 years
